description: Onsite tech support for various companies across Acadiana and Baton Rouge.
achievements: Consulted with multiple companies on reported information technology concerns.
Installed WiFi access points (UniFi, Netgear), configured network interfaces (Netgear), and terminated ethernet cables for full Wifi setup.
Setup and maintained network file share using Synology servers.
Setup and deployed iPads, MacBooks, iMacs, and Apple TVs in Apple Business Manager and mobile device management solutions including JAMF and Mosyle.
Managed Microsoft Azure and Google Workplace accounts for clients.
Creation and management of support tickets through Zendesk, including calls for remote support.
